College Summary: IIT Madras is the top technical and research university founded in 1959. IIT Madras has been consistently ranked #1 among the top engineering colleges in India as well as in the overall category. IIT Madras offers more than 100 program via its 19 departments. IIT Madras is located over a sprawling 250 hectares of campus and houses over 550 faculty members, 8000 students, and 1250 administrative and supporting staff. IIT Madras has signed MOUs with several foreign universities for student exchange programs. As per the MoUs signed, students pursuing UG, PG, and Dual Degree programs at the institute spend a semester abroad for broad exposure.

IIM Ahmedabad, founded in 1961 is the second oldest IIM and is consistently ranked as the best business school of India. IIM Ahmedabad was ranked 1st by NIRF 2023, among the top 100 Indian B-Schools. IIM Ahmedabad is known for its 2 year PGP (MBA) program which offers admissions through CAT. IIM Ahmedabad cutoff remains around 80 percentile in CAT for shortlisting and students with over 99 percentile have a good chance of getting the interview call. IIM Ahmedabad is known for its stellar placements in the Consulting and Finance domain. IIM Ahmedabad MBA fees is 25 Lakhs while IIM Ahmedabad average package stood at INR 32.79 LPA and IIM Ahmedabad highest package stood at INR 1.15 CPA (As per the data researched by Collegedunia) for the 2023 batch making its ROI very high.

IIM Bangalore, established in 1973 is the 2nd best management institute in India, according to NIRF ranking. IIMB Flagship MBA and EMBA program has also been ranked 47th  by the FT Global MBA Rankings 2024. IIM Bangalore's 2-year MBA program offers admission through CAT. IIM Bangalore cut-off is around 85 percentile overall for the Written Ability Test (WAT) and Personal Interview (PI) round.

IIM Calcutta - Indian Institute of Management, Calcutta is one of the top and oldest IIMs in the Country. IIM Calcutta is renowned for pioneering education in the finance sector. IIM Calcutta is known for its 2-year flagship MBA program, which accepts admission through CAT. IIM Calcutta cut off is 85 percentile, however candidates scoring 96-99 percentile or higher are considered for admission.

IIM Lucknow is the 4th IIM to be established by the Government of India in 1984. IIM Lucknow mentors the newly established IIM Jammu, IIM Rohtak and IIM Kashipur. IIM Lucknow is widely known for its academic excellence, diverse student community, and strong industry interface. IIM Lucknow was ranked 6th by NIRF 2023 and 6th by IIRF 2024 in the Management Category. The Institute also secured 85th Rank in FT Global MBA 2024 Rankings. The institute provides international exposure to its students through international exchange programs and international competitions.
Table of Content

IIM Indore is one of the prestigious management institutes established in 1996. IIM Indore has been ranked 8th by NIRF 2023. IIM Indore EPGP program has been awarded 89th rank among the Top 100 Global MBA courses by FT Ranking 2023. IIM Indore offers PGP, Executive PGP, PhD in the field of management. IIM Indore MBA fees is INR 21.17 Lakhs.

IIM Kozhikode is one of the premier management institutes established in 1996, by the Government of India. IIM Kozhikode ranks 3rd by NIRF 2023 among the top B-Schools in India. IIM Kozhikode offers admission to its 2-year flagship PGP program, through CAT. IIM Kozhikode cut-off is 85 percentile (Overall) and the sectional cutoff is 75 percentile, yet candidates with a 98 percentile or higher have a better chance of being selected for the Interview. IIM Kozhikode MBA fees is INR 20.50 lakh, whereas IIM Kozhikode average package stood at INR 31.02 LPA.

IIT Roorkee is an autonomous technical and research University located in Roorkee, Uttarakhand. Established in 1847 as Thomason College of Civil Engineering, IIT Roorkee is Asia's oldest technical university. The main campus of IIT Roorkee is located in Roorkee, Haridwar District over an area of 358.5 acres. IIT Roorkee also has 2 other campuses, one in Saharanpur (around 30 Km from Roorkee) and another one in Greater Noida. IIT Roorkee is ranked as #1 in the top architecture colleges in India by NIRF 2023. In the engineering category, IIT Roorkee has been ranked 5th in NIRF 2023 Ranking.

JBIMS is one of the oldest B-schools in India with a legacy of over 52 years. JBIMS was established in 1965 by the University of Mumbai. JBIMS has been consistently ranked among the top 10 premier B-Schools in India and it continues to hold a 10th rank in Outlook 2023 among the top Govt. B-Schools. JBIMS was the first institute in India to provide a full-time 2-year Master in Management Studies (MMS). JBIMS is known for its low fees and its distinguished alumni base. JBIMS MMS fee is INR 6.10 lakhs whereas the JBIMS average package stood at INR 28.02 LPA and JBIMS highest package stood at INR 35.75 LPA in the 2023 placement drive.

IIM Shillong established in 2007 is a public management institution, affiliated with the North Eastern Hill University (NEHU). IIM Shillong has been ranked 26th among the top management institutes in India by NIRF Ranking 2023. The institute has a strong employment track record, with alumni being hired by top Indian and worldwide organisations. Check: Is IIM Shillong worth joining?

IIM Mumbai (NITIE) is a postgraduate, Public Management institute located in Powai Mumbai. IIM Mumbai (NITIE) has been recognized as one of India’s Ivy-League B-School consistently for 5 decades by MHRD. The institute has recently been ranked 7th by NIRF 2023 and 8th by IIRF 2024 in the Management Category. IIM Mumbai (NITIE) offers MBA as its flagship program. Admission to these courses are done through CAT, followed by Group discussion and Personal Interviews. IIM Mumbai (NITIE) CAT cut-off is 85 percentile overall.

TISS also known as Tata Institute of Social Sciences (TISS) is a Multi-campus Research University in Mumbai. TISS is known for its interdisciplinary approach to social sciences. TISS is ranked 98 in the University Category by NIRF 2023. TISS HRM intake is 60. TISS Mumbai offers PG & Doctoral Programs in various specializations. Admission to the PG programs are based on CUET PG Exam followed by Personal Interview. Earlier, TISS Mumbai admissions were conducted through an institute-level examination TISSNET, but now TISS has announced that for the academic year 2024 -25, it will consider CUET PG for admission into all its PG programs.

IIT Bombay MBA established in 1995, is a part of IIT Bombay. SJMSOM offers a two-year flagship MBA program in management as well as Doctoral Programs in Management. The College was ranked 10th by NIRF 2023 and 10th by IIRF 2024. The school also offers short-term programs in areas of management for the faculty of technical and management institutions during the Summer and winter seasons. IIT Bombay MBA admission are done on the basis of CAT / GMAT. For the Doctoral Program, the candidates are required to submit an SOP on the proposed area of research. The Shortlisted candidates will be called for an interview. SJMSOM CAT Cutoff 2024 is 90 percentile. Check SJMSOM Cutoff
Why MBA from DMS IIT Delhi?

SIBM Pune - Symbiosis Institute of Business Management Pune is a Constituent of Symbiosis International (deemed) University. Established in 1978, SIBM Pune is known for its vast Alumni Network, Coursework & Student - Centered Culture. SIBM Pune is ranked 17th by NIRF 2023 in the Management Category.

AIIMS Delhi is India’s Best Medical Institute established in the year 1956 in the capital city, New Delhi. AIIMS Delhi is an Institute of National Importance offering medical and para-medical courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels. AIIMS Delhi has been ranked 1st in the Medical Category in NIRF Ranking 2023. The institute is also ranked 6th under the 'Overall' Category by NIRF 2023. All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi is the first institute in the group to be established in the country under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare and governance of the AIIMS Act, 1956.

School of Business Management (SBM) is a Department for Management studies functioning under NMIMS University, Mumbai. The institute comes among the premier private B-schools in India with AACSB accreditation is ranked 4th in the Outlook-ICARE MBA rankings 2020 for Private B-Schools. This department offers management programs like MBA, Executive MBA, Enterprise Training for women, Management Development Programs, and Ph.D. in Management. Admission to the NMIMS SBM based on the entrance exam namely NMIMS-NMAT at the institute level.

IIM Udaipur is among the new IIMs, established in 2011, and has been ranked 16th by NIRF 2023. IIM Udaipur is known for its flagship MBA program, which offers admission through the CAT, followed by a personal interview conducted through CAP. IIM Udaipur cut-off is 94 percentile (overall) for the personal interview round.
Why MBA from IIM Raipur?

IIM Trichy is one of the fastest-growing second-generation IIMs, established in 2011. It is one of the premier management institutes with a full-fledged state-of-art campus, spread over 176 acres. IIM Trichy was ranked 22nd by NIRF 2023, among the top B-schools in India. At IIM Trichy, the minimum CAT percentile for the 2023-25 batch was 92 percentile for PGP. A total of 151272 general category candidates selected IIM Trichy as their CAT preference of which 9543 were shortlisted for the WAT PI round and 828 of them received the final offer.

SCMHRD (Symbiosis Centre for Management and Human Resource Development) is a Premier B-School situated in Pune. Established in 1993, SCMHRD is known for producing Quality Talent in the HR, Marketing field, 100% Placement Records. SCMHRD offers a 2-year flagship MBA program with an intake of 180 students. The Institute offers specializations in HR, Finance, Marketing, Operations, Business Analytics, and Infrastructure Development and Management.

Reflecting on my time at IIM Rohtak, I am filled with gratitude for the enriching experiences and personal growth it has afforded me. Each day has been a stepping stone in my journey, marked by memorable moments and cherished friendships. Let's explore this transformative experience together.

IIM Kashipur is among the second-generation IIMs established in 2011. IIM Kashipur was ranked 19th by NIRF 2023 among the top management institutes in India. IIM Kashipur is known for its 2-year flagship MBA program which offers admission through CAT. The cutoff is 94 percentile overall and 73 percentile for sectional. IIM Kashipur MBA fee is INR 17.30 lakhs, whereas IIM Kashipur average package stood at INR 18.11 LPA and IIM Kashipur highest package stood at INR 37 LPA for the batch 2023.

Institute of Management Technology, Ghaziabad popularly known as IMT Ghaziabad is one of the oldest and top private B-schools and was established in 1980. IMT Ghaziabad was ranked 38th by NIRF 2023. It has also been consistently ranked among the top 20 business schools and top 10 private business schools in the country. IMT Ghaziabad is known for its flagship 2-year PGDM program, which accepts admission through CAT, XAT and GMAT. IMT Ghaziabad PGDM cut-off is expected to be above 90 percentile for both CAT and XAT. IMT Ghaziabad PGDM fees is INR 21.53 lakh for 2 years whereas the average offered was INR 17.35 LPA. Apart from Ghaziabad, IMT also has campuses in Nagpur and Hyderabad. There is a common application form for all campuses.

XIMB (Xavier Institute of Management Bhubaneswar) established in 1987, has been recognized as a premier business school with a legacy of 30 years. Since 2013, XIMB has been a constituent business school of Xavier University, Bhubaneswar. XIMB was ranked 46th by NIRF 2023 among the top management institutes in India. XIMB is known for its flagship MBA program. XIMB Intake is 356 students.

MICA, established in 1991 is a well-known residential institute to offer PGDM in Strategic Marketing and Communication. MICA Ahmedabad was ranked 37th by NIRF 2023 among the top management institutes in India. MICA Ahmedabad is known for its flagship 2-year PGDM in Communication (PGDM-C) program. MICA PGDM intake is 180.

IIM Bodh Gaya, established in 2015 is one of the prestigious management institutes, which has been ranked 53rd among the top management institutes in India by NIRF 2023. IIM Bodh Gaya offers MBA, IPM and PhD courses in various areas of management. IIM Bodh Gaya MBA fees is 15.5 Lakhs whereas IIM Bodh Gaya Average Package stood at INR 15.68 LPA which was increased by 30.5% whereas IIM Bodh Gaya Highest Package increased by 103.9% which stood at INR 48.5 LPA.

According to the PGIMER Chandigarh NIRF Report 2023, the median package during PGIMER Placements stood at INR 17 LPA for PG (3-Year) Batch and INR 8 LPA for PG (2-Year) Batch. A total of 205 students of the institute are placed in its 2022 Placement Drive. Top recruiters visiting the PGIMER Placements are Apollo Hospital, Fortis Hospital, Manipal Hospital, AIIMS, and others.

College Name: Indian Institute of Science, Department of Management Studies  - [DMSIISC], Bangalore
College Summary: National Law School of India University (NLSIU) is a government university in Bangalore. Established in 1986, NLSIU was the first national law university to be set up in India. Considered one of the top law schools in India, NLSIU Bangalore is ranked #1 among top law universities/schools in India by various organizations such as NIRF, Outlook, India Today, etc.

IIM Jammu is the youngest IIMs established in 2016. IIM Jammu was ranked 41st by NIRF 2023. IIM Jammu is known for its 2 year flagship MBA program, which offers admission through CAT. IIM Jammu cut-off is 94 percentile. But the candidates who have a score above 94 percentile have more chances of getting shortlisted for personal interview, through CAP.

IIM Sambalpur is among the new IIMs established in 2015, by the Government of India. IIM Sambalpur was ranked 58th by NIRF 2023. IIM Sambalpur is known for its 2-year flagship MBA programme and admissions are held via CAP along with 9 other baby IIMs. IIM Sambalpur cut-off is 94 percentile. IIM Sambalpur MBA fees is INR 17.86 Lakh, whereas IIM Sambalpur average package stood at INR 16.64 LPA and IIM Sambalpur highest package stood at INR 64.61 LPA for the 2023 batch.

Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI) popularly known as Pusa Institute is India's premier national Institute for agricultural research, education and extension. The Institute is situated in Delhi and is financed and administered by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR).IARI has the status of a ‘Deemed-to-be-University’ under the UGC Act of 1956.

IIM Sirmaur, established in 2015, is the 3rd generation IIM mentored by IIM Lucknow. The institute was ranked 98th by NIRF 2023 among the top management Institutes in India. IIM Sirmaur offers MBA and MBA in Tourism program, the institute also offers Executive MBA, Ex-MBA in Digital Transformation & Analytics, and various Ph.D. programs such as Executive Ph.D. and Ph.D. (AICTE-QIP). IIM Sirmaur MBA fees is INR 16 Lakhs for the 2-year program.

Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad, a public technical research institution, is situated in Telangana's Sangareddy district in Hyderabad, India. IITH was established in 2008 and is an Institute of National Importance (INI) established by the Ministry of Human Resource Development. IIT Hyderabad is ranked 14th overall and 8th under the "Engineering" category in the NIRF 2023 Rankings. IIT offers 30+ UG and PG courses including engineering, science, liberal arts, design, and management.

IMI Delhi is India's first corporate-sponsored business school established in 1981. The college is ranked 34th by NIRF 2023 in Management category and 11th in India by Business Today 2023. IMI Delhi offers PGDM, PGDM (HRM), PGDM (B&FS), 18 - Month PGDM (Executives), and FPM (Doctoral Program).

TAPMI or T. A. Pai Management Institute is one of the Top Management Institutes in India and was established in 1980. Located in the serene hills of Manipal, TAPMI was ranked 42nd by NIRF 2023 and is one of the 19 B-schools in India to be accredited by the AACSB. TAPMI offers MBA and PhD courses, but is more famous for its flagship MBA program which is offered in General, HR, BKFS, Marketing and International Business domains.

College Name: IIM Sirmaur - Placements, Fees, Average Package, Cut off, New Campus, Admission 2024, Ranking, Courses
College Summary: Institute of Rural Management Anand is a premier business school located in Gujarat, India. IRMA has secured 54th rank among the best business schools in India by NIRF Ranking 2023. The 2-year fully residential PGDM (RM) is the flagship program of IRMA Anand. Admissions to the 240 PGDM (RM) seats are based on the CAT/XAT/CMAT/GMAT scores, followed by Written Ability Test and Personal Interview.

Department of Business Economics (DBE), located in New Delhi was established in 1973 and is one of the top-ranked colleges in North India.The department has been illustrating the exceptional knowledge and learning deliverables since its exceptions. The flagship business program at this niche business school is its two-year full-time MBA in Business Economics with specialisation in Finance, Econometrics and Marketing . DBE DU offers M Phil and Ph.D. programmes to which admissions are made in accordance with the rules of the University of Delhi. Students applying for MBA at the DBE DU must have valid and eligible CAT scores to get admission. To get admission to the MPhil and PhD level programmes, the department follows the admission process of the DU. Check Department of Business Economics Courses & Fees

FORE School of Management is a private business school located in South Delhi. The B-School is ranked 63rd among Top Management Colleges in India by NIRF in 2023. The School is known for its PGDM courses in International Business, Financial Management, Big Data Analytics electives. Apart from PGDM/ MBA course, the college also offers Executive MBA and FPM programs.

SIBM Bangalore is a constituent college of Symbiosis International University established in 2008. SIBM offers MBA in various specializations and Executive MBA Part-time. SIBM Bangalore MBA Admissions are conducted based on a valid score on the SNAP (Symbiosis National Aptitude Test) Entrance Test, followed by Personal Interview, Written Ability Test and Group Exercise.

NMIMS Bangalore is one of the leading business schools, established in 2008 at Koramangala. NMIMS Bangalore has been ranked 30 by Business Today Ranking 2023 among the top B-Schools in India. It has also been ranked 32nd among the top private B-Schools in India by IIRF Ranking 2024.

SIMSREE (Sydenham Institute of Management Studies, Research and Entrepreneurship Education), established in 1983, is a government management institute, operated by the Government of Maharashtra. SIMSREE has been ranked 25th by IIRF 2024. SIMSREE is known for its flagship MMS program, and admission is done through DTE.

Lady Shri Ram College (LSR) is one of the constituent colleges of Delhi University. Lady Shri Ram College was established in the year 1956. In the country-wide NIRF Rankings, LSR has been ranked among the top 5 colleges and is accredited with a grade of ‘A++’ by the NAAC.  It is also approved by the UGC and is recognized by the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD).

JAGSOM (Jagdish Sheth School of Management) formerly IFIM Business School, Bangalore is an AICTE approved institution. Jagdish Sheth School of Management (JAGSoM) is amongst the first 6 business schools in India to be awarded AACSB accreditation. JAGSoM was ranked 26th by Business Today Ranking 2023 and is amongnst the 12 leading Indian B-schools. It is accredited by AACSB and features in the QS World University Global Ranking 2023.
Why MBA from KJ Somaiya?

Prin. L. N. Welingkar Institute of Management Development & Research, also known as Welingkar is one of the top management colleges in India. The college has two campuses, i.e. Mumbai and Bangalore. WeSchool Mumbai is known for its 2-year full-time flagship PGDM program to its students. Apart from this, the college also offers a PGDM program in Business Design, E-Business, Research & Business Analytics, Healthcare Management, Retail Management, Rural Management, Media & Entertainment. Admission to the PGDM programs of the college is offered o the basis of  CAT, XAT, ATMA, CMAT and GMAT scores. WeSchool's Unique Profile-based selection process assigns significant value to academic performances, work experience, Group Activity, Personal Interviews along with written test scores.

College Name: Lady Shri Ram College for Women (LSR)

College Summary: Taxila Business School , Jaipur (TBS), is one of the best management institutes in Jaipur. Taxila offers 2 years PGDM + SAP with Business Analytics program recognized by AICTE. Taxila Business School Admissions is through various entrance tests such as CAT/MAT/XAT/CMAT or GMAT.

Birla Institute of Management Technology (BIMTECH) is one of the top management institutes in India, established in 1988, and is supported by the Birla group of companies. BIMTECH has been ranked 48th by NIRF 2023 among the top 100 management institutes in India. BIMTECH offers a 2-year flagship PGDM program and offers 240 seats + 45 Supernumerary seats.

Established in 1995, LBSIM stands as one of the premier business schools in Delhi NCR, consistently ranking among the top five. The institute has earned its place among the top 20 private B-schools and the top 50 overall. Offering a flagship full-time PGDM program admitting 180 students, LBSIM provides specialization options across four areas.

Management Institute of Development (MDI) in Murshidabad is a private college offering a Postgraduate Diploma in Management with four specializations. MDIM has another branch in Gurugram commonly known as MDIG. Admission to PGDM is via the CAT entrance exam.

Woxsen School of Business, Hyderabad was established in 2014 and offers diverse degree programs catering to a range of academic pursuits. Woxsen offers industry-responsive UG and PG degree programs, leading to new-age careers. Robust curriculum is meticulously designed to empower students with frameworks to lay business and technological foundations as corporate leaders, skilled professionals and entrepreneurs.

IBS Hyderabad is a constituent of the ICFAI Foundation established in the year 1995 in Hyderabad, Telangana. IBS Hyderabad is approved by AICTE, UGC and AIU. It is one of the 19 business schools in the country to have received the globally accepted AACSB accreditation. IBS Hyderabad is ranked 40th by NIRF 2023 and 23rd by Business Today Ranking 2023, among the top B-Schools in India. IBS Hyderabad offers MBA as its flagship program.

Institute of Management, Nirma University (IMNU) offers flagship course of MBA in various specialisations and 2 intergrated courses. The institute also provides PhD (Full-time and Part time) and Diploma courses. Admission to the MBA course is based on valid scores in CAT followed by Personal Interview Round and Theme Development & Presentation (TDP) whereas Admission to BBA-MBA integrated program is based on valid scores in IPMAT. Admission to integrated B.Tech-MBA is based on valid scores in JEE Main. The total fees for MBA program is INR 10.88 Lacs

SIES School of Business Studies has been ranked 22nd by Times B- School among All B-Schools in India. The most popular course offered at the institute is PGDM, PGDM Biotechnology and PGDM Pharmaceutical Management. These courses are offered in 5 specializations: Marketing, Finance, Operations, Information Technology and Business Analytics.

Established in 2014, Dr. D.Y. Patil B-School, Pune is a private college under Dr. D. Y. Patil Vidyapeeth, approved by AICTE. It has been ranked 19th among the top management institutes in India by Time B School 2023. The college offers a 2 year Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) and a Post Graduate Diploma in Management-Business Administration (PGDM BA). The admission into the PGDM Course at Dr. D.Y. Patil B-School, candidates must appear for at least one national level exam like CAT, MAT, XAT, CMAT or ATMA. The institute is accepting applications for the academic year 2024. Candidates may apply to the courses by filling out the application form available on Dr. D.Y. Patil B-School’s official website.

Apeejay School of Management (ASM) is ranked among the top league of 20 B-School in India. ASM Dwarka is famous for its PGDM/ MBA program and has a record of providing 95% placement to students. More than 130+ companies visited for on-campus recruitment. The highest package was recorded at INR 20.1 LPA. It offers a full-time Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) program.

The Indian Institute of Forest Management (IIFM), Bhopal was founded in 1982 is an autonomous institution under the Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change, Government of India, IIFM was conceptualized in response to the recommendations of the National Commission on Agriculture. This culminated in an alliance with the Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad and IIFM evolved.

XIME Bangalore was established in 1991 and is one of the top B-Schools of India, with two other residential campuses in Chennai and Kochi. Since its inception, XIME has been shaping future leaders and hence contributing towards nation-building. The institute believe there are multiple paths towards true leadership. And at XIME, it provides the environment for each student to discover their own. For some, it’s discovering hidden facets of themselves that inspire others. For most, the two years spent on XIME’s stimulating, challenging, yet nurturing campus have been transformative.
The following table consists of highlights of CMC Vellore:

International School of Management Studies [ISMS] Pune, Maharashtra was established in 2009. The institute is accredited by Edexcel- UK. ISMS is affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and University Grants Commission (UGC). The institute has won Enterpreneurial & Innovative Excellence Award by NIIEM, 2021 and Promising B-School of New Age by The Voices 2020. Further, the institute has ranked 11th in What if not in IIMS B-School Survey by Silicon India, 2021.

College Name: Apeejay School of Management - [ASM], New Delhi
College Summary: Sanjay Gandhi Postgraduate Institute of Medical Sciences (SGPGIMS), popularly known as SGPGI Lucknow, is a prominent medical institute in India established in 1983 in Uttar Pradesh to provide postgraduate education in the field of Medical Sciences. SGPGI was established as a Centre of Excellence in Uttar Pradesh for providing medical care, education, and research. The institute is recognized by UGC and is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI). SGPGI has been ranked 7th in India by NIRF Ranking and 8th in India by IIRF Ranking in 2023 in the Medical Category. The institute offers postgraduate and super specialty courses in various specializations. MD, MS, DM, and M.Ch are the major courses offered by SGPGIMS. Along with PG Courses, SGPGIMS Lucknow also provides B.Sc and M.Sc in Allied Health Sciences. Admissions to most of the courses at SGPGI are entrance-based.

Praxis Business School is one of the top private B-Schools established in the year 2007 popularly known as PBS Kolkata. The institute is approved by AICTE. It offers admission to a 2-year Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) in the disciplines of Marketing, Finance, Human Resource, Management, Data Science and Production Management. Apart from this, PBS Kolkata also offers a 9-month PG Program in Data Engineering in regular and online modes. Praxis Business School has been ranked 2nd in Kolkata and 4th in East India for PGDM by Times B School Survey 2022.

Approval: NCTE, AICTE, COA, BCI, UGC, AIU
College Summary: Lovely Professional University (LPU) is a private university established in 2005 in Jalandhar, Punjab. LPU is approved by UGC, NCTE, PCI, COA, BCI, PSCAE, ITPI, and other prominent organizations. The university is accredited by NAAC with an A++ Grade, ACBSP, and ICAR and it holds the membership of AIU, IAU, IIE, ACU-UK, and The Institution of Engineers (India). LPU is ranked at 38th position in NIRF Ranking 2023 among all Private and Government Universities in India. The university is the largest single-campus university in India with more than 30,000 students, offering 150+ programs across 40+ disciplines in the fields of Engineering, Business, Law, Architecture, Management, and others. LPU Admission is based on merit in LPUNEST (Lovely Professional University National Entrance and Scholarship Test).

Approval: NCTE, COA, PCI, IAP, BCI, ICAR, UGC
College Summary: Jamia Millia Islamia (JMI) is a central university located in New Delhi. Established in 1920, the university is recognized by the UGC and accredited by an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. Jamia Millia Islamia is ranked 3rd among the top universities in India and 25th rank in the management category by NIRF 2023. JMI has several research centers including the Center for Management Studies, the Nelson Mandela Center for Peace and Conflict Resolution, and the AJK Mass Communication Research Center.

Chandigarh University is a private university established in the year 2012 located in Mohali, Punjab. The university is accredited with an “A+ Grade” by NAAC and recognized by UGC and AICTE. Chandigarh University is approved by ICAR, BCI, NCHMCT, PCI, COA, NCTE, AIU, CSI, and other prominent bodies. The institute holds the membership of international organizations like, IAU, ACU, IEEE, ASME, IUCEE, and ACS. The university offers admission through Chandigarh University Common Entrance Test (CUCET) scores to different UG and PG courses. As per NIRF Ranking 2023, Chandigarh University is ranked at 27th position among all the Indian Universities. CU has also received accreditation from ABET for eight of its engineering programs.

Approval: NCTE, AICTE, COA, PCI, BCI, NCHMCT, UGC, NBA, AIU
College Summary: School of Planning and Architecture (SPA) New Delhi, is a premier institute of architecture established in the year of 1941. It is deemed to be a university having recognition as an institute of National importance. The college is ranked #5 in NIRF 2023 ranking for Architecture. SPA Delhi has collaborations with SPA Vijaywada, SPA Bhopal and B.R Ambedkar University of Delhi.

College Name: International School of Management Studies - [ISMS], Pune
College Summary: IMS Ghaziabad is one of the trusted Business Schools in India with 34 years of academic legacy. Established in 1990, IMS Ghaziabad is one of the Best B schools in India accredited by NBA. IMS Ghaziabad offers AICTE approved PGDM program in five specialisations as its flagship course. Admission to IMS Ghaziabad is done on CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT + GD and PI round + Written Aptitude test scores. Direct Link to Apply for IMS Ghaziabad Admissions

St. Stephen’s College was founded in the year 1181 and is affiliated to Delhi University. It is recognized by the UGC and is accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A’ grade. St. Stephen’s College has also been ranked 14th in the college category as per NIRF Ranking 2023. Similarly, the college has been ranked 2nd for Arts and 3rd for Science by India Today.

Banaras Hindu University (BHU), formerly known as Central Hindu College, is a central university located in Varanasi, India. It is recognised by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by NAAC. BHU is ranked 5th among the Top Universities in India by NIRF Ranking 2023. BHU Campus spans across 1,300 acres of land and has all the facilities that students can imagine. In fact, it is the largest residential university in Asia with over 30,000 students residing on campus. BHU Affiliated Colleges includes 6 institutes, 14 faculties, 140 departments, four interdisciplinary centres, a constituent college for women, and 3 constituent schools.

Jagan Institute of Management Studies (JIMS) Technical Campus, Rohini offers 2-year full-time flagship PGDM Program. The institute also offers 3 UG programs as BA-ECO(H), BBA and BCA, a PG program of MCA and a Fellowship doctoral program. Admission to PGDM programs are based on entrance exam XAT/ MAT/ CAT/ CMAT/ GMAT/ ATMA followed by a  Group Discussion and Personal Interview round whereas admission to MCA is based on valid scores in  NIMCET. JIMS Fees for the Fellowship program is INR 4.85 Lacs. Direct Link to Apply for JIMS Rohini admission

PSG Institute of Management (PSGIM) is ranked 89th by NIRF 2023 and 37th by IIRF 2024 in the Management Category. PSGIM Coimbatore offers postgraduate and doctoral courses in management. Admissions at PSGIM to these courses are conducted every year and done on the basis of management entrance test - CAT, MAT, TANCET, ATMA, etc.

Anna University is a government university located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is recognized by the UGC as a “University with Potential for Excellence” (UPE) and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. As per the NIRF 2023 rankings, Anna University is the 18th best university to study in India. Anna University offers 29 UG, 90 PG, and Doctorate level courses under 8 faculties and over 30 departments on its campus. Additionally, it offers more than 100 Degree and Diploma courses through its 593 affiliated colleges that have over 7.2 lakh students enrolled. Check Anna University Affiliated Colleges

National Centre for Management of Agricultural Extension or popularly known as MANAGE was established in 1987 by the Ministry of Agriculture. It is an autonomous institute located in the state of Hyderabad. It is sprawled over an artistically landscaped area of 17 hectares which has beautiful lawns, academic blocks, residential blocks, library, computer centers, and much more other facilities. The Institute provides specializations only in postgraduate diploma courses in agricultural management.

IIEBM Indus Business School situated in Pune, Maharashtra was established in August 2000 as an Educational Institute recognized by the Govt. of Maharashtra. The Institute that is spread across 2000 sq. ft. is affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University (SPPU). IIEBM offers PG Diploma course in Management to the candidates. The institute offers PGDM & PGD-ERP programmes. There are 6 specializations in the PGDM programme.

MET Institute of Management was established by the Mumbai Educational Trust in 1989. The college is Ranked 2nd Best B-School in Mumbai, India's 17th Best Pvt. B-School, 28th Best B-School All India and 14th amongst Top West B-Schools by the Times B-School Survey 2023. The Institute has been awarded ‘’Best Education Brand’’ By the Economic Times. MET is also ISO certified and affiliated to the University of Mumbai.

Institute of Management Technology, Nagpur is one of the Top Business Schools in India Institute of Management Technology, Nagpur is a private business school established in 2004. The School is affiliated with AICTE and earned numerous accreditations such as AIU, NBA, AACSB, and AMDISA. The college is accorded with the Super League status. Apart from Nagpur, IMT has its other campuses in Ghaziabad, Hyderabad and Dubai.

Established in 1995, Jaipuria Institute of Management, Lucknow has earned 27 years of excellence in management education while ranked 92nd amongst Top Management Institutes in India by NIRF 2023 and 66th by IIRF 2024 in Top private B-Schools in India. Jaipuria Lucknow is AACSB Business Education Alliance Member and accredited with NAAC Grade ‘A’. The institute offers two-year full-time AICTE-approved, NBA accredited and AIU recognized PGDM programs - PGDM, PGDM (Financial Services), PGDM (Retail Management) and doctoral level Fellowship Program in Management (FPM).

IBA Bangalore, established in the year 2001 is one of the top private MBA colleges in Bengaluru. The institute boasts of being one of the top 1% colleges in India and one among the only 56 out of more than 5000 colleges in India to receive an International Accreditation by IACBE. World Consulting & Research Corporation (WCRC) has certified IBA (process evaluated by KPMG) as one of Asia’s fastest-growing Institutes.

College Name: SIES College of Management Studies - [SIESCOMS], Navi Mumbai
College Summary: FOSTIIMA Business School is one of the best PGDM institutes in Delhi-NCR. It was established in the year 2007 and has been approved by AICTE (All India Council for Technical Education). During, the 8th National Education Awards by ABP News, FOSTIIMA Business School was awarded as 'Outstanding B-School in North-India'. It is an exclusive business school that believes in transforming students into a new pool of upcoming managers for prominent companies. FOSTIIMA offers a two-year full-time PGDM/MBA course for graduate students.

The Institute of Public Enterprise (IPE) was established in 1964 as an autonomous non-profit society. In 1995, the Institute launched its flagship course two years full-time Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) program. It also provides PGDM in the areas of Marketing, Banking Insurance, and Financial Services, International Business, and Human Resource Management. Besides, IPE also provides part-time PGDM (Evening) and a doctoral degree course in Social Sciences. The courses offered are also recognized as equivalent to MBA by the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). IPE Admission to any PGDM courses is based on the CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ GMAT/ CMAT/ ATMA scores.

NIT Tiruchirappalli popularly known as NIT Trichy features among the top 10 engineering institutions in India. Established in 1964 as Regional Engineering College, NIT Trichy was granted autonomous status in 2003 and renamed as National Institute of Technology. Apart from a stellar ranking of 9 in NIRF 2023 Engineering rankings, NIT Trichy has successfully bagged 4th rank in Architecture and 35th rank in Management categories. The 800-acre campus of NIT Trichy is located in Thuvakudi on the Trichy - Tanjore road (NH 67).

ISB&M is India's premier AICTE approved B- school which has completed 24 Glorious Years and has been known for its innovation, a strong faculty-student driven connect and consistent placement performance. Established in 2000 and located at Nande, Pune, International School of Business and Media (ISB&M) has established Global benchmarks in learning standards and talent development. The institute is ranked Amongst top 2% B-schools in India in terms of Education & Career Building and 2nd most preferred B School in Pune.

Established in 2004, Jaipuria Institute of Management (JIM), Noida has driven 18+ years of excellence in management education. The institute is ranked 47th amongst all Management Institutes in India by NIRF 2023 and 74th in Top B-Schools by Business Today (BT) 2023.

Kasturba Medical College (KMC), Manipal was the first private medical college in India established in 1953. It got recognition in 1958 by the Medical Council of India & in 2008 from the Government of India. The institute comes under the aegis of the Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE). KMC offers degree and doctoral programs in the discipline of Surgery, Medicine, Super Speciality, Forensic Science and many more. Admission is done on the basis of entrance exams and cutoff criteria of the institute.

Balaji Institute of Modern Management (BIMM) Pune, established in 1999 with its maiden batch passing out in year 2001 is a premier management institute located in Pune. The institute offers full-time MBA degree and executive MBA for professionals.

In the globalized world we live in, very few countries or companies can be self-sufficient without the need to interact with the global economy. Keeping the needs of such transnational companies in mind, BIIB was started in 2003 with the aim of training managers to tackle the challenges of the global economy. The practice-oriented courses are carefully designed to include the elements of foreign trade. Balaji Institute of International Business (BIIB), Pune is run under the aegis of Sri Balaji Society established in 1999.

N.L. Dalmia was established in 1995 offers postgraduate programs in management and PhD. The Institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and is also affiliated to the University of Mumbai. Admissions at N.L. Dalmia to these programs are conducted every year and offered on the basis of scores obtained in national-level entrance exams. N. L. Dalmia aims to nurture, empower and enhance the skills of future business leaders by providing value-based quality education. The institute conducts various industrial visits which help in providing students with hands-on experience.

Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) is one of the premier medical institutes in India. JIPMER was established on its current campus in 1964 in Pondicherry and is recognized by the Medical Council of India. JIPMER has been ranked as the 5th Best Medical Institute in India as per NIRF Ranking 2023. It has also been recognized as an ‘Institution of National Importance’ by the Government of India. JIPMER is among the very few institutions in the country that offer courses from undergraduate to super specialty levels in the field of Medicine and Health Sciences.

Tamil Nadu Agricultural University (TNAU) is an agricultural university located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India and was established in 1971. The university is recognized by UGC and functions in accordance with Tamil Nadu Directorate of Education.

College Name: Balaji Institute of Modern Management - [BIMM], Pune
College Summary: Symbiosis Institute of Operations Management was established in 2005 with the affiliation of Symbiosis International (Deemed University) and is approved by AICTE. Institute has won many awards including the “Pride of Maharashtra Award”, “B-School with the Best Industry-related Curriculum in Operations Management", and "B-School Excellence Award for Innovative, Modern and Industry related Curriculum". SIOM Nashik has been ranked 25th by IIRF Ranking 2024 among the top private B-Schools in India.

College Name: Balaji Institute of International Business (BIIB), Pune
College Summary: Acharya NG Ranga Agriculture University also known as ANGRAU Guntur that was established under the name of Andhra Pradesh Agricultural University (APAU) on the 12th of June 1964 through the APAU Act 1963. ANGRAU is one of the finest & premier universities in the fields of Agriculture & Home Science. With the help & guidance of extraordinary faculty members, the educational institute is approved by ICAR & UGC.

Institute of Liver and Biliary Sciences (ILBS), is located in Delhi NCR, New Delhi. ILBS was established in 2009 and is an autonomous mono-super speciality hospital for liver and biliary diseases. The university is approved by UGC. According to the NIRF ranking 2023, ILBS ranked in the 23rd position among the top medical colleges in India. The courses offered by this institute include PDCC, PGCC, PhD, DM, M.Ch and certificate courses.

International School of Management Patna or popularly known as ISM Patna was established in the year 2011 and is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). The institute offers a Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) course to the students. The admission process is merit-based and the institute accepts scores of the exams like CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ CMAT. ISM Patna has signed an MoU with the SolBridge University, South Korea. It will provide the students with an opportunity to spend one trimester in South Korea without any extra tuition fee.
The highlights of KGMU are tabulated below:

IILM Institute for Business & Management is a Private Institute located in Gurgaon, Haryana. The Institute was established in the year 1993 and is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). Courses offered by the Institute are PGDM and FPM. Admissions to PGDM program will be done on the basis of CAT/ MAT/ CMAT/ GMAT/ XAT/ ATMA/ NMAT Entrance Exam score.

College Name: Asia-Pacific Institute of Management New Delhi
College Summary: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU), popularly known as IP University or IPU is a state university, located in Delhi. GGSIPU is one of the largest universities in Delhi with a campus area of 78 acres and an enrollment of more than 8000 students. IPU is recognized by the UGC and accredited with an ‘A’ grade by the NAAC. It has been ranked 74th among the universities in India by NIRF 2023. IPU has more than 120 affiliated colleges out of which 83 are self-financed and 35 are owned and managed by the Government of NCT of Delhi.

Krea University is one of the top universities for Liberal Education. Krea University has been enacted by the Legislature of the State of Andhra Pradesh as per The Andhra Pradesh Private Universities (Establishment and Regulation) (Amendment) Act, 2018 vide the gazette notification published on April 30, 2018. The university is a state-private university approved by UGC. As per the NIRF Ranking 2023, the university is ranked 74th  in the Management Category. IFMR Society is the sponsoring body of the University. Institute for Financial Management and Research (IFMR) has wide and deep experience in education and research for the past 48 years.

Acharya Institute of Management and Sciences is now known as the AIMS INSTITUTES was established in the year 1994 by a group of eminent educationists and philanthropists to impart quality education. AIMS Institute started with 2 UG programs and 60 students and now offering various PG & UG programs having around 2000 students at the campus.
Table of Content

BIMHRD was started in 2004, with the aim of transforming students into industry leaders who can not only lead but also influence shape, and nurture their industry ecosystem. The institute provides two-year full-time PGDM programs in PM & HRD.BIMHRD formerly known as ICMHRD is a unique institute which has emerged as one amongst the Best B-schools in the country within a short period of time.

Panjab University (PU), also known as Panjab University Chandigarh (PUCHD), is a public research university located in Chandigarh, India. Established in 1882, it is one of the oldest universities in India and is known for its high standards of teaching and research. PU is ranked by several ranking agencies such as NIRF, Times Higher Education, and QS (Asia). Panjab University is ranked 44th by the NIRF in the Overall University rankings category of its 2023 ranking. Panjab University is an AICTE-approved university and has 188 affiliated colleges in eight districts of Punjab and the UT of Chandigarh. Check Panjab University Affiliated Colleges

College Name: IILM Institute for Business and Management
College Summary: XISS Ranchi (Xavier Institute of Social Service), established in 1955, is a private management institute. XISS offers a PGDM program with a specialization in Human Resources, Rural Management, Finance, and Marketing. The PGDM program at XISS is AICTE-approved and holds equivalence to an MBA degree by AIU. XISS Ranchi has been ranked 36, among the private MBA colleges by Outlook-ICARE 2023.

Indian Institute of Social Welfare and Business Management (IISWBM), established in 1953, is the first business school in India to offer an MBA degree. It offers many postgraduate programs, certificates, and doctoral programs in management. Admission for all these courses is based on National level exams such as CAT, MAT, CMAT, GATE, GMAT, JEMAT, XAT, ATMA, and Group Discussion Personal Interview (GDPI) which is conducted by the institute. IISWBM has been ranked 49th by IIRF Ranking 2024 among the top private B-Schools in india.

Shri Dharmasthala Manjunatheshwara Institute for Management Development, commonly called SDMIMD has been a premier B-School in Mysore since 1993. The institution is recognized by AICTE and accredited by NBA. The faculty established by SDM Education Trust, is affiliated to University of Mysore and Tumkur University, Kerala.

College Name: Balaji Institute of Management and Human Resource Development - [BIMHRD], Pune
College Summary: Loyola Institute of Business Administration (LIBA) Chennai is a private business school, established in 1979. The school is approved by the AICTE and recognised by the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). It is one of the best management colleges in India and has been ranked 42nd by Business Today Ranking 2023. LIBA Chennai has also earned global accreditation from SAQS and AACSB. LIBA Chennai offers a two-year Full-time flagship PGDM course, approved by AICTE. The School also offers other programs such as Part-time PGDM, PhD. and one-year executive diploma programs. The Management Development Centre offers various customized programs as well.

IMT Hyderabad was established in 2011 and is now among the fast-growing Bschool in India. The college has 14000+alumni members across the world and 40+ Foreign University collaborations. The college offers a 2-year full-time residential flagship PGDM program and a 15-month Executive PGDM. The programs at IMT Hyderabad are approved by AICTE. It is also accredited by SAQS and NBA and has MBA equivalence issued by the AIU. Check IMT Hyderabad Admission

College Name: Aditya Institute of Management Studies and Research - [AIMSR], Mumbai
College Summary: Maulana Azad Institute of Dental Sciences, popularly known as MAIDS, is one of the best dental institutes located in New Delhi. MAIDS is the only dental institution affiliated with the University of Delhi (DU) offering BDS and MDS courses along with patient care and research activities. MAIDS is recognized by the Dental Council of India (DCI) and has been declared a 'Center of Excellence' by the Government of Delhi.

IIT BHU is ranked 31st overall and 15th in the engineering category in the NIRF rating for 2023. In 1919, the Banaras Engineering College was founded, and in 2012, it changed its name to the Institute of Technology of India Banaras Hindu University (IIT-BHU). One of the first engineering schools in India, it led the way in the development of mechanical, electrical, ceramic, and pharmaceutical engineering. Spread over 1,300 acres, it is an Indian public technological university in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh.

Acharya Nagarjuna University was established in 1976 by the former President of India, Shri Fakruddin Ali Ahmed in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh. The university offers 68 undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the fields of Engineering, Sciences, Arts, Pharmacy, Sports and Architecture. It also provides M.Phil and Ph.D in 48 disciplines spread over six campus colleges. It has 450 affiliated colleges in Krishna, Guntur and Prakasm Districts. The National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) awarded Acharya Nagarjuna University an “A” grade. It is spread over an area of 300 acres. There are 5000 students enrolled in the university. Acharya Nagarjuna University is ranked 63rd in the Pharmacy Category by NIRF Ranking 2023. The university is focused on research with 66 patents, 200+ projects and more than 15000 research publications. The institute also offers distance education through ANUCDE.

Institute of Chemical Technology, Mumbai (ICT Mumbai) previously known as the University Department of Chemical Technology (UDCT) was established in 1933 with the support of multiple industries. In the recent rankings of 2023, ICT Mumbai has been placed at the 5th position among the NIRF Pharmacy Category and 24th rank in Engineering category by NIRF 2023. Check more about ICT Mumbai Rankings.

Bharathidasan Institute of Management, Tiruchirappalli or BIM Trichy is a Private Indian business school established in 1984. BIM is affiliated to Bharathidasan University as an autonomous institution of excellence managed by an independently run professional society. The B-School is ranked 86th among the top 100 MBA colleges in India by MHRD NIRF Ranking 2023. BIM Trichy is also ranked 82nd in Top B-School & 33rd in South Zone by IIRF 2023.

The Prestige Institute of Management and Research (PIMR), Indore is one of the premier management institutes of Madhya Pradesh. PIMR runs its programs through its three campuses: UG, PG, and the Department of Law. The college is popular for its MBA program (both full-time and part-time) with placements ranging between 3-4 LPA with most of the students recruited in the BFSI and FMCG sectors. Other than this, the college offers BBA, B.Com, BAJMC Electronic Media, LLB (Hons), LLM, etc. Admission to all courses is either merit-based or entrance-based. Check: PIMR Indore admission

Indian Institute of Technology Indore was established in 2009 in Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India. According to NIRF 2023, IIT Indore is placed 14th in the Engineering category and 28th Overall Category. IIT Indore is an autonomous public University and is one of the eight new IITs started by the government of India. The institute has its permanent campus, which spans 501.42 acres. There are 40 courses available at IIT Indore, including UG, PG, and PhD options, across 11 departments.

College Name: Maulana Azad Institute of Dental Sciences (MAIDS)
College Summary: Established in 2006, International School of Management Excellence (ISME) is one of the leading private B-Schools located in Bangalore, Karnataka. The institute was founded by an alumni from Carnegie Mellon University, Purdue University and Wharton Business School, USA.

SOIL Institute of Management, established in 2008, is awarded the SHRM’s ‘Game Changer’ Academic Institute of the Year Award and ranked 20th in 1-Year MBA and 62nd in Top B-Schools by Business Today (BT) 2023. SOIL was co-created by 32 leading companies and supported by 25 NGOs with the aim to build Leaders with character, competence and enthusiasm. SOIL offers postgraduate programs in Human Resource, Business Design, and Business Leadership. Accredited by AICTE, SOIL Institute of Management houses two modern campuses - in Gurgaon and the Manesar (New Gurgaon) -  to nurture and transform more than 5000 students across India.

Loyola College is a private Catholic institute of higher education located in Chennai. Established in 1925, Loyola College is affiliated to the University of Madras. The college is ranked 7th among the top 100 colleges in NIRF Rankings 2023 and accredited with an ‘A++’ grade by the NAAC. Loyola College offers more than 50 UG, PG, and PhD programs across various disciplines to more than 10000 students every year.

IIT Dhanbad is an autonomous university, established in 1926. IIT Dhanbad is ranked 17 in the Engineering category, 44 in Management, 24 in Research, and 42 in the Overall category by NIRF 2023. The campus of IIT Dhanbad covers 218 acres. The most popular program at IIT Dhanbad is BTech. Apart from the flagship BTech program IIT Dhanbad also offers Integrated MTech, MTech, and MSc Courses. IIT Dhanbad BTech admission is granted as per JEE Advanced score followed by JoSAA Counselling.   Check: IIT Dhanbad Admission

College Name: IILM Institute for Higher Education, New Delhi
College Summary: Established in 1991, ITM Business School has offered an AICTE approved PGDM program for the last 32 years. In 2023 ITM Group established ITM Skills University, a UGC approved University. From AY 2024 onwards, ITM's highly sought after ITM PGDM iConnect will be offered as an MBA award under ITM Skills University. This future focused change is going to further transform the ITM MBA iConnect into a modern, technology and industry aligned experience. This includes 5 months of Intensive Industry Internship for the students to develop, make them corporate-ready and capable of handling challenges.

School of Planning and Architecture, Bhopal is established in the year 2008 by the Government of India as an institute of National Importance. The institute is ranked 11 in NIRF 2023 Architecture Ranking. SPA Bhaopal offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral levels programmes in Architecture, Design and Planning streams, namely, BArch, BPlan, MArch, MPlan, MDes and PhD.  Know More: SPA Bhopal Courses & Fees

College Name: Prestige Institute of Management & Research (PIMR) Indore- Courses, Cut off, Rankings, Placement, MBA Fees
